project_descr: The objective of the SELAJSI Programme is to strengthen access to justice and the enforcement of law while simultaneously supporting the foundations for longer-term social integration and development-This Project focuses on responses to SGBV.

outputs.output_descr: Contributing towards the SELAJSI Programme, this particular Project will focus on strengthening capacities of state and non-state actors for a comprehensive and coordinated response to address sexual and gender based violence.

document_name: SELAJSI Focus on SGBV 2014 Project Document
